# Welcome to the CryptoCurrency Arena ‚Çø

![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.0-blue.svg?cacheSeconds=2592000)
![issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/EzekielCarvalho/portugues-goa)
![stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/EzekielCarvalho/portugues-goa)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](#)

![Cryptocurrency Banner](banner.png "Welcome to the Cryptocurrency Arena!")

> An application designed and built to fetch cryptocurrency data from the coingecko API. This application gives the Name, Symbol, Current Price, High 24 Hour Rate as well as the Low 24 Hour Rates. Additionally, it gives details of each individual cryptocurrency.

<img src="cryptogif.gif" width="100%" height="100%"/>


### üè† Visit the app here: [![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Cryptocurrency-Arena-E66581.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://ezekielcarvalho.github.io/cryptocurrency-arena/)

## Key Features

* An application for cryptocurrency lovers and investors
* Fully functional application with a single link for each cryptocurrency to give necessary details
* awesome business-style-card effect
* User Friendly interface

## Usage

It's pretty simple to clone this project, ensure that you've got Git and Node.js   
(you have to use npm) installed on your computer.

Then using your terminal:

```sh
# Clone this repository
$ git clone git@github.com:EzekielCarvalho/cryptocurrency-arena.git

# Head over into the repository
$ cd coins

# Install dependencies
$ npm install

# If there are any vulnerabilities
$ npm audit fix

# Then make the changes to the app as per your desire

# You can view the complete running app via github-pages

```

## Instructions 

To use this app, simply visit the site, and wait for the images to load and you are good to go.
